message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.MM

The paper proposes two visually-aware recommender systems for e-commerce platforms, which suggests that it could belong to several sub-categories. However, the focus on product recommendations and assortment generation suggests that it is most likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category. The use of transfer learning and topic modeling for visual-based style compatibility also suggests that it could belong to Computer Vision (cs.CV) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The incorporation of text data and polylingual topic modeling suggests that it could also belong to Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) and Multimedia (cs.MM) sub-categories.
